title: June, 2021
content: Two papers of my supervised students are accepted by IEEE ITSC 2021. One is about Named Entity Recognition, the other is about Topic Model for fault prediction.

title: June, 2021
content: I was invited to give a guest lecture at Southeast University.

title: May, 2021
content: Two papers are accepted by KDD 2021. One is about electric carsharing fleet management, the other is about Large-Scale Driving Pattern Characterization for Usage-based Insurance

title: April, 2021
content: I present our paper about deep reinforcement learning based electric taxi fleet management at IEEE ICDE 2021.

title: April, 2021
content: I attend the 2021 NSF Smart & Connected Communities Principal Investigators' Meeting.

content: Working as a visiting student at MIT Media Lab with Prof. Alex 'Sandy' Pentland.

content: One paper is accepted by ACM IMWUT (UbiComp 2021).
